title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package enabling Ollama models as LLM, chat, and embedding backends.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible endpoint).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API; Android compatible.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based CLI helper with REPL, conversation history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style code-completion service for VS Code.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings Ollama chat and image-to-text into any server.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for private LLM tests.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Elixir wrapper with GenServer and LiveView examples for real-time chat apps.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented-generation stack using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client library with async/await and native JSON streaming.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET SDK supporting .NET 6+ and Unity via async enumerable streams.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client with cross-compilation support for ARM and x86_64 Linux/macOS.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators and embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI autocomplete, summarization, and note Q&A via Ollama.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for private on-prem LLM queries.
